page.title: 16PYECOMBE GOLF COURSE
page.content: Pyecombe Golf Course covers the central part of our block on top of the Downs. The professional has been there for 18 years. He told us that the Club started in 1894 with a separate ladies course. Today members' ages range from 9 to 7O. They come from all different social backgrounds. Thirty years ago artisans made up much of the membership. Fifteen years ago it cost Â£35 to join, today Â£36O for adults but only Â£3O for children. This is half the price compared to London courses. Pyecombe Course has only 3 groundstaff who use machinery including tractors and mowers. The professional believes that bigger greens and more hazards like bunkers would make the course even more enjoyable. It is a small, friendly club on a pretty course which is attractive to members in all seasons.
